infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Mari Gunting needs your location to show your availability to nearby customers and navigate to their locations.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Mari Gunting needs continuous location access to keep you visible to customers even when the app is minimized. This helps you receive booking requests and provides real-time location updates to customers.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Mari Gunting needs continuous location access to keep you visible to customers even when the app is minimized. This helps you receive booking requests and provides real-time location updates to customers.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Mari Gunting needs continuous location access to keep you visible to customers even when the app is minimized. This helps you receive booking requests and provides real-time location updates to customers.
